text: New Jack City is a 1991 crime drama movie starring Ice-T, Wesley Snipes and Mario Van Peebles (who also directed the movie). The movie is set in New York City and is about the trafficking of illegal drugs and associated violence. == Other websites == * Category:1991 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Antisocial personality disorder in fiction Category:1990s English-language movies Category:American gangster movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Narcissism in fiction Category:American independent movies
title: New Jack City
